mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM_TBL(item_num, CG_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_PUBLISHER, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_UP_FOLDER, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_BUY) VALUES(SEQ_ITEM_TBL.nextval, #{cg_code}, #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_discount}, #{item_publisher}, #{item_content}, #{item_up_folder}, #{item_img}, #{item_amount}, #{item_buy})
mapper.select:
select ITEM_NUM, CG_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_PUBLISHER, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_UP_FOLDER, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_BUY, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_UPDATEDATE from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(PRODUCT_TBL pk_pro_num) */ rownum rn, ITEM_NUM, CG_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_PUBLISHER, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_UP_FOLDER, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_BUY, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_UPDATEDATE from ITEM_TBL where
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select count(*) from ITEM_TBL where
ITEM_NUM > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM_TBL SET ITEM_PRICE = #{item_price}, ITEM_BUY = #{item_buy} WHERE ITEM_NUM = #{item_num}
